flawed_nl_solution:
The kingfisher caught 13 + 7 = <<13+7=20>>20 fish.
The pelican and kingfisher caught 13 + 20 = <<13+20=33>>33 fish
The fisherman caught 3 x 33 = <<3*33=99>>99 fish
The fisherman caught 99 - 13 = <<99-13=81>>81 more fish than the pelican.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 86, not 81. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
